price: Thus did We save the Children of Israel from the humiliating punishment,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
